sentences.sContent: She rinsed her hands quickly before eating.
sentences.sContent_eng: She rinsed her hands quickly before eating.
sentences.sCn: 她吃东西以前很快洗了一下手。

sentences.sContent: He supplements his regular meals by eating between meals.
sentences.sContent_eng: He supplements his regular meals by eating between meals.
sentences.sCn: 他在两餐之间吃点东西来补充正餐。

sentences.sContent: Those people are concerned only with eating,sleeping and procreating.
sentences.sContent_eng: Those people are concerned only with eating,sleeping and procreating.
sentences.sCn: 那些人关心的只不过是吃饭、睡觉和生孩子。

synos.tran: 侵蚀的；可生食的；进餐用的
